Introduction
=============

This is a product that makes it possible to enable a collective.plonetruegallery on all content.


Changelog
==========

0.3
------
Added setting so it is possible to choose where gallery should go (above content or below content)


0.2.5
------
Added profile for showing the true gallery below main content

0.2
----
Added new template to try to fix js problem


0.1
-------

First version
